Title: Elon Musk rebrands Twitter as X
Synopsis: Elon Musk rebrands Twitter as X, replacing the iconic bird logo, amidst financial struggles and increased competition, aiming to transform the global town square with free speech principles.

Title: Thousands of authors demand payment from AI companies for use of copyrighted works
Synopsis: Published authors, including renowned names like Margaret Atwood and Dan Brown, are demanding compensation from AI companies for the use of their copyrighted works in training AI tools, claiming unfair profiting and potential copyright violations.

Title: Special counsel prosecutors question witnesses about chaotic Oval Office meeting after Trump lost the 2020 election
Synopsis: Special counsel prosecutors are investigating a chaotic Oval Office meeting that took place after the 2020 election, where former President Donald Trump considered desperate proposals to remain in power. Witnesses, including Rudy Giuliani, have been questioned about the meeting, which involved discussions of seizing voting machines and invoking martial law. The special counsel's sustained interest in the episode suggests charging decisions may be nearing in the investigation into efforts to overturn the election results. The focus on the meeting aligns with the broader examination of Trump's allies' actions from December 2020 to January 6, 2021.
tags: Trump, 2020 election, Big Lie, Giuliani, Sidney Powell,
